00015 /**
00016 * @brief Constructor of Castep format
00017 * @param filename Name of the file to be read.
00018 * @param model The model where the imported data will be saved.
00019 */
00020 Castep::Castep(System::String^ filename, Model^% model)
00021 {
00022         SystemModel=model;
00023         FileName=filename;
00024         ReadingFile = gcnew StreamReader(filename);
00025         FormatName="CASTEP";
00026 }
00027 
00028 /**
00029 * @brief Main function for opening and reading file
00030 * @return Returns false if the format does not seem to be correct.
00031 */
00032 bool Castep::LoadFile(void)
00033 {
00034         String^ fileline=gcnew String("");
00035         bool  OK = true;
00036 
00037         //Turn off Refreshing for faster importing
00038         AtomCollection->Refreshing=false;
00039 
00040 
00041     //read the first line to understand if it is the new format or the old one
00042         fileline=ReadLine();
00043         try
00044         {
00045                 if (fileline->Contains("#$magres-abinitio-v1.0")) 
00046                         OK=NewFormat( fileline); //New CASTEP format
00047                 else OK=OldFormat(fileline); //Old CASTEP Format
00048         }
00049         catch(String^ e) 
00050         {
00051                 throw gcnew Exception("Problem in Reading File in Line "+LineCount+". " +e);
00052         }
00053 
00054 
00055         //Turn on again Refreshing which causes calculation of bonds
00056         AtomCollection->Refreshing=true;
00057         ReadingFile->Close();
00058         return true;
00059 }
00060 
00061 /**
00062 * @brief Main function for reading file of old format
00063 * @return Returns false if the format does not seem to be correct.
00064 */
00065 bool Castep::OldFormat(String^ firstline)
00066 {
00067         int number;                                             //number of fields in each line
00068         String^ fileline=firstline;         //line
00069         array<String^>^numbers = nullptr;   // Matrix of the fields after splitting of a line
00070         String^ delimStr = " ,";            //seperator of fields
00071         array<Char>^delimiter = delimStr->ToCharArray(); //Conversion to char array
00072         //Dictionary for saving quadropolar constants for specific elements
00073         Dictionary <String^, double>^ quadrupolecon=gcnew Dictionary<String^, double>();
00074 
00075         //Read until end of file
00076         while (!ReadingFile->EndOfStream )
00077         {
00078                 //Bug: case when 2 line have =====
00079                 if(fileline->Contains("============")) 
00080 
00081                 {  
00082                         fileline=ReadLine();
00083 
00084                         //Reading of quadropolarconstants
00085                         if(fileline->Contains("electric quadrupole moment"))
00086                         {
00087                                 while(!(fileline=ReadLine())->Contains("============"))
00088                                 {
00089                                         //Read the quardopolar constant 
00090                                         number=7; 
00091                                         numbers=fileline->Split(delimiter,StringSplitOptions::RemoveEmptyEntries );
00092                                         if(number!=numbers->Length) throw gcnew Exception("Problem in quadrupole moment");
00093 
00094                                         //Try to add quadropolar constant in the dictionary else throw exception
00095                                         try 
00096                                         {
00097                                                 quadrupolecon->Add(numbers[0], Convert::ToDouble(numbers[5]));
00098                                         }
00099                                         catch (ArgumentException^)
00100                                         {
00101                                                 throw gcnew Exception("Quadrupole constant declared twice");
00102                                         }
00103 
00104                                 }
00105                         }
00106                         else if(fileline->Contains("Atom"))
00107                         {
00108                                 //Check if an Atom is presented
00109                                 number=3; //Number of Strings in the Line describing an Atom
00110                                 numbers=fileline->Split(delimiter,StringSplitOptions::RemoveEmptyEntries );
00111                                 if(number!=numbers->Length) throw gcnew Exception("Problem in Reading Atom");
00112                                 
00113 
00114                                 fileline=ReadLine();//============
00115 
00116                                 //Read Atom and coordinates
00117                                 number=7; //Number of Strings in the Line describing an Atom and coordinates
00118                                 //H        1 Coordinates      3.499    0.756   -0.603   A
00119                                 fileline=ReadLine();
00120                                 numbers=fileline->Split(delimiter,StringSplitOptions::RemoveEmptyEntries );
00121                                 if(number!=numbers->Length) throw gcnew Exception("Problem in Reading Atom Coordinates");
00122 
00123                                 //Check if the atom is already imported
00124                                 int AtomID;
00125                                 if(!CheckImportAtom(numbers, AtomID)) throw gcnew Exception("Problem in Interaction Atom");
00126         
00127                                 fileline=ReadLine();//Empty line
00128 
00129                                 //Read Interaction 
00130                                 fileline=ReadLine(); //TOTAL Shielding Tensor
00131                                 number=2; //Number of Strings in the Line describing kind of interaction
00132                                 numbers = nullptr;
00133                                 numbers=fileline->Split(delimiter,StringSplitOptions::RemoveEmptyEntries );
00134 
00135                                 //Check if number of fields are coorect and if the keyworf TOTAL is  is present
00136                                 if(number>numbers->Length || !fileline->Contains("TOTAL"))
00137                                 throw gcnew Exception("Problem in Reading Interaction Kind");
00138 
00139                                 //Check if it is hemical shielding or Quadropolar
00140                                 InteractionKind Intkind;
00141                                 if(numbers->Length>number && numbers[1]=="Shielding" && numbers[2]=="Tensor") 
00142                                 {Intkind=InteractionKind::CShielding;ToShift=true;}
00143                                 else if (numbers[1]=="tensor") Intkind=InteractionKind::Quadrupolar;
00144                                 fileline=ReadLine();  //Empty line
00145 
00146                                 //Read quadrupolar interactions
00147                                 if(Intkind==InteractionKind::Quadrupolar)
00148                                 {
00149                                         //Quadropolar factors
00150                                         double factor=2.3496e+02;//(efg_atomic*e_charge*1e-28/h_planck)MHz
00151                                         double qconst;
00152                                         
00153                                         //Find nuclear spin quantum number and in case smaller 
00154                                         //or equal than 0.5 find other isotope 
00155                                         if (((Atom^)AtomCollection[AtomID])->isotope->Spin<=0.5)        
00156                                                 ((Atom^)AtomCollection[AtomID])->isotope=
00157                                                 Isotopes::FindIsotopeWithHigherSpin(((Atom^)AtomCollection[AtomID])->isotope);
00158                                         double NSQN=((Atom^)AtomCollection[AtomID])->isotope->Spin; //nuclear spin quantum number
00159                                         
00160                                         //Try to find the quadrupolar constant for this element
00161                                         try
00162                                         {
00163                                                 qconst=quadrupolecon[((Atom^)AtomCollection[AtomID])->isotope->Element];
00164                                         }
00165                                         catch (KeyNotFoundException^)
00166                                         {
00167                                                 throw gcnew Exception("Quadrupole constant for "+
00168                                                         ((Atom^)AtomCollection[AtomID])->isotope->Element+" did not declared") ;
00169                                         }
00170 
00171                                         //Reading interaction matrix and creating quadrupolar interaction
00172                                         fileline=ReadLine();
00173                                         int j;
00174                                         //If isotope with no 0.5>spin just ignore
00175                                         try
00176                                         {
00177                                                 //Number of Fields: 3, XYZ index: 0,1,2
00178                                                 ExtractInteractionMatrix3x3(fileline, "Quadrupolar Coupling", 
00179                                                         (Atom^)AtomCollection[AtomID], (Atom^)AtomCollection[AtomID], 
00180                                                         factor*qconst/(2*NSQN*(2*NSQN-1)),
00181                                                         false, 0, j, 3, 0, 1, 2, 
00182                                                         Units::MHz, Intkind, 
00183                                                         SystemModel->RefFrameCollection[1], 
00184                                                         InteractionCollection);
00185                                         }
00186                                         catch (String^ e) {/*Continue*/};
00187 
00188                                 }//Read Chemical shield interactions
00189                                 else
00190                                 {
00191                                         //Reading interaction matrix and creating Chemical shield interaction
00192                                         fileline=ReadLine();
00193                                         int j;
00194                                         //Number of Fields: 3, XYZ index: 0,1,2, no factor
00195                                         ExtractInteractionMatrix3x3(fileline, "Chemical shielding", 
00196                                                 (Atom^)AtomCollection[AtomID], (Atom^)AtomCollection[AtomID], 
00197                                                 1.0,
00198                                                 false, 0, j, 3, 0, 1, 2, 
00199                                                 Units::ppm, Intkind, 
00200                                                 SystemModel->RefFrameCollection[1], 
00201                                                 InteractionCollection);
00202                                 }
00203 
00204                                 //8 Empty lines
00205                                 for (int i=0;i<8;i++) fileline=ReadLine();
00206                         };
00207                 };
00208                 fileline=ReadLine(); //Last thing is read the next line
00209         };
00210         return true;
00211 }

00213 /**
00214 * @brief Main function for reading file of new format
00215 * @return Returns false if the format does not seem to be correct.
00216 */
00217 bool Castep::NewFormat(String^ firstline)
00218 {
00219         int number;                                                     //number of fields in each line
00220         String^ fileline=firstline;         //line
00221         array<String^>^numbers = nullptr;   // Matrix of the fields after splitting of a line
00222         String^ delimStr = " ,  ";          //seperator of fields, includes "tab"
00223         array<Char>^delimiter = delimStr->ToCharArray(); //Conversion to char array
00224 
00225         //Read the file until the end of it 
00226         while (!ReadingFile->EndOfStream)
00227         {
00228                 if(fileline->Contains("<atoms>")) //Atom Reading
00229                 {  
00230                         fileline=ReadLine(); //units lattice Angstrom
00231                         fileline=ReadLine(); //lattice    6.0000000000000009E+00   0.0000000
00232                         fileline=ReadLine(); //units atom Angstrom
00233 
00234                         while(!(fileline=ReadLine())->Contains("</atoms>"))
00235                         {
00236                                 //atom H       H       1        -8.6634114E-01       -1.722893E-01      -6.46057010E-01
00237                                 number=7; //Number of Strings in the Line describing an Atom
00238                                 numbers=fileline->Split(delimiter,StringSplitOptions::RemoveEmptyEntries );
00239                                 if(number!=numbers->Length)  throw gcnew Exception("Problem in Reading Atom") ;
00240 
00241                                 //Add atom in the collection
00242                                 Atom^ nAtom=gcnew Atom();
00243                                 nAtom->X=Convert::ToDouble(numbers[4]);
00244                                 nAtom->Y=Convert::ToDouble(numbers[5]);
00245                                 nAtom->Z=Convert::ToDouble(numbers[6]);
00246                                 nAtom->isotope=Isotopes::FindIsotope(numbers[1],0, 0);
00247 
00248                                 //Used for recognition of the interaction
00249                                 nAtom->Label=numbers[2]+numbers[3];
00250 
00251                                 AtomCollection->Add(nAtom);
00252                         }
00253                 }
00254                 else if(fileline->Contains("<magres>")) //Interactions Reading
00255                 {
00256                         while(!(fileline=ReadLine())->Contains("</magres>"))    
00257                         {
00258                                 if(fileline->Contains("units"))  //Reading Interaction Units
00259                                 {
00260                                         //Do something with this bloody units
00261                                 }
00262                                 else if (fileline->Contains("ms") || fileline->Contains("efg") || fileline->Contains("isc "))
00263                                 {
00264                                         //Read Interaction 
00265                                         // ms H   1  3.2E+01  1.2E+00  3.8E+00  1.9E+00   2.7E+01  2.49E+00   4.1E+00  2.2E+00  3.0E+01
00266 
00267                                         InteractionKind Intkind;
00268                                         if(fileline->Contains("ms"))
00269                                         {
00270                                                 Intkind=InteractionKind::CShielding;
00271                                                 number=12; //Number of Strings in the Line describing ms interaction
00272                                                 ToShift=true;
00273                                         }
00274                                         else if(fileline->Contains("efg"))
00275                                         {
00276                                                 Intkind=InteractionKind::Quadrupolar;
00277                                                 number=12; //Number of Strings in the Line describing efg interaction
00278                                         }
00279                                         else if(fileline->Contains("isc "))
00280                                         {
00281                                                 Intkind=InteractionKind::Jcoupling;
00282                                                 number=14; //Number of Strings in the Line describing isc interaction
00283                                         }
00284                                         else
00285                                         {
00286                                                 throw gcnew Exception("Problem in Reading Interaction Kind:Unknown Interaction") ;
00287                                         };
00288 
00289 
00290                                         //Reads the line with the interaction matrix
00291                                         numbers = nullptr;
00292                                         numbers=fileline->Split(delimiter,StringSplitOptions::RemoveEmptyEntries );
00293                                         if(number!=numbers->Length)
00294                                                 throw gcnew Exception("Problem in Reading Interaction Kind: Wrong line Format") ;
00295 
00296                                         //Put the data in the matrix
00297 					::Matrix3x3^ matrix=gcnew ::Matrix3x3();
00298                                         int jj=(numbers->Length==12?0:2);
00299                                         matrix[0]=Convert::ToDouble(numbers[jj+3]);matrix[1]=Convert::ToDouble(numbers[jj+4]);
00300                                         matrix[2]=Convert::ToDouble(numbers[jj+5]);matrix[3]=Convert::ToDouble(numbers[jj+6]);
00301                                         matrix[4]=Convert::ToDouble(numbers[jj+7]);matrix[5]=Convert::ToDouble(numbers[jj+8]);
00302                                         matrix[6]=Convert::ToDouble(numbers[jj+9]);matrix[7]=Convert::ToDouble(numbers[jj+10]);
00303                                         matrix[8]=Convert::ToDouble(numbers[jj+11]);
00304 
00305                                         //If J-coupling just use the 1/3 trace of matrix
00306                                         if(Intkind==InteractionKind::Jcoupling)
00307                                         {
00308                                                 matrix[0]=(matrix[0]+matrix[4]+matrix[8])/3.0f;
00309                                                 matrix[4]=matrix[0];
00310                                                 matrix[8]=matrix[0];
00311                                                 matrix[1]=0.0f;
00312                                                 matrix[2]=0.0f;
00313                                                 matrix[3]=0.0f;
00314                                                 matrix[5]=0.0f;
00315                                                 matrix[6]=0.0f;
00316                                                 matrix[7]=0.0f;
00317                                         };
00318 
00319                                         Tensor^ nInteraction;
00320                                         int AtomID,AtomID2;
00321 
00322                                         //Find the Atom ID from the label
00323                                         for each(int i in AtomCollection->Keys)
00324                                         {
00325                                                 if(((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->Label==numbers[1]+numbers[2]) 
00326                                                 {
00327                                                         AtomID=((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->getID();
00328                                                         break;
00329                                                 };
00330                                         }
00331 
00332                                         if(Intkind==InteractionKind::Quadrupolar)
00333                                         {
00334                                                 //Find nuclear spin quantum number and in case smaller 
00335                                                 //or equal than 0.5 find other isotope 
00336                                                 if (((Atom^)AtomCollection[AtomID])->isotope->Spin<=0.5f)
00337                                                         ((Atom^)AtomCollection[AtomID])->isotope=
00338                                                         Isotopes::FindIsotopeWithHigherSpin(((Atom^)AtomCollection[AtomID])->isotope);          
00339 
00340                                                 //Creating Quadrupolar interaction
00341                                                 //If isotope with no 0.5>spin just ignore
00342                                                 try
00343                                                 {
00344                                                         nInteraction=gcnew Tensor((Atom^)AtomCollection[AtomID], (Atom^)AtomCollection[AtomID],
00345                                                                 Intkind, matrix);
00346                                                         nInteraction->unit=Units::MHz;
00347                                                         nInteraction->Frame=SystemModel->RefFrameCollection[1];
00348                                                         InteractionCollection->Add(nInteraction);
00349                                                 }
00350                                                 catch (String^ e) {/*Continue*/};
00351                                         }//Creating Chemical shield interaction
00352                                         else if(Intkind==InteractionKind::CShielding)
00353                                         {
00354                                                 nInteraction=gcnew Tensor((Atom^)AtomCollection[AtomID], (Atom^)AtomCollection[AtomID],
00355                                                         Intkind, matrix);
00356                                                 nInteraction->unit=Units::ppm;
00357                                                 nInteraction->Frame=SystemModel->RefFrameCollection[1];
00358                                                 InteractionCollection->Add(nInteraction);
00359 
00360                                         }//Creating J-coupling interaction
00361                                         else if(Intkind==InteractionKind::Jcoupling)
00362                                         {
00363                                                 //Find the second Atom ID from the label
00364                                                 for each (int i in AtomCollection->Keys)
00365                                                 {
00366                                                         if(((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->Label==numbers[3]+numbers[4]) 
00367                                                         {
00368                                                                 AtomID2=((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->getID();
00369                                                                 break;
00370                                                         };
00371                                                 }
00372 
00373                                                 //Creating J-coupling interaction when the atoms are different
00374                                                 if(AtomID!=AtomID2)
00375                                                 {
00376                                                         nInteraction=gcnew Tensor((Atom^)AtomCollection[AtomID],
00377                                                                 (Atom^)AtomCollection[AtomID2],Intkind, matrix);
00378                                                         nInteraction->unit=Units::ppm;
00379                                                         nInteraction->Frame=SystemModel->RefFrameCollection[1];
00380                                                         InteractionCollection->Add(nInteraction);
00381                                                 };
00382                                         }
00383                                 }
00384                         }
00385                 };
00386 
00387                 fileline=ReadLine(); //Last thing is read the next line
00388         };
00389 
00390         return true;
00391 }

00393 /**
00394 * @brief Main function for adding an atom to the collection checking if this happen before
00395 * @return Returns always true.
00396 */
00397 bool Castep::CheckImportAtom(array<String^>^ atomline, int & AtomID)
00398 {
00399 
00400         //check first if the Atom already exists
00401         for each(int i in AtomCollection->Keys)
00402         {
00403                 if(((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->Label==atomline[0]+atomline[1]) 
00404                 {
00405                         AtomID=((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->getID();
00406                         return true;
00407                 };
00408         }
00409 
00410         Atom^ nAtom=gcnew Atom();
00411 
00412         nAtom->X=Convert::ToDouble(atomline[3]);
00413         nAtom->Y=Convert::ToDouble(atomline[4]);
00414         nAtom->Z=Convert::ToDouble(atomline[5]);
00415 
00416         nAtom->isotope=Isotopes::FindIsotope(atomline[0],0, 0);
00417 
00418 
00419         nAtom->Label=atomline[0]+atomline[1];
00420         AtomCollection->Add(nAtom);
00421         AtomID=nAtom->getID();
00422         return true;
00423 }
